name: between
posTip: Word used before noun, pronoun or -ing form of verb to show place, direction, etc.

dsense.name: between
dsense.posTip: Word used before noun, pronoun or -ing form of verb to show place, direction, etc.

trans_examp.trans_en: in or into the space that separates two places, people, or objects

example.eg: The town lies halfway between Rome and Florence.
example.egtrans: 此城镇位于罗马和佛罗伦萨的中间。

example.eg: Standing between the two adults was a small child.
example.egtrans: 站在两个大人之间的是个小孩。

example.eg: She squeezed between the parked cars and ran out into the road.
example.egtrans: 她在停放的车子间挤来挤去，最后跑到了马路上。

example.eg: There were two houses with a narrow path in between.
example.egtrans: 一条狭窄的小路从两幢房子之间穿过。

dsense.name: between
dsense.posTip: Word used before noun, pronoun or -ing form of verb to show place, direction, etc.

trans_examp.trans_en: If something is between two amounts, it is greater than the first amount but smaller than the second.

example.eg: She weighs between 55 and 60 kilograms.
example.egtrans: 她的体重在55公斤到60公斤之间。

example.eg: The competition is open to children between six and twelve years of age.
example.egtrans: 比赛是为6岁至12岁的孩子而设的。

example.eg: The room was either extremely cold or hot, never anything in between (= in the middle).
example.egtrans: 这间屋子不是极冷就是极热，从来都没有不冷不热的时候。

dsense.name: between
dsense.posTip: Word used before noun, pronoun or -ing form of verb to show place, direction, etc.

trans_examp.trans_en: in the period of time that separates two different times or events

example.eg: You shouldn't eat between meals.
example.egtrans: 你不应该吃零食。

example.eg: There is a break of ten minutes between classes.
example.egtrans: 课间有10分钟的休息时间。

example.eg: The office is closed for lunch between 12.30 and 1.30.
example.egtrans: 办公室午饭时间关闭，时间从12点半到1点半。

example.eg: In between sobs, he managed to tell them what had happened.
example.egtrans: 他泣不成声，呜咽着向他们诉说所发生的一切。

example.eg: He visits his parents every month and sometimes in between.
example.egtrans: 他每个月都去看望父母，有时候去得更频繁一些。

name: between
posTip: Word used before noun, pronoun or -ing form of verb to show place, direction, etc.

dsense.name: between
dsense.posTip: Word used before noun, pronoun or -ing form of verb to show place, direction, etc.

trans_examp.trans_en: among two or more people or things
trans_examp.trans_cn: 在（两个或两个以上的人或事）之间

example.eg: The money was divided equally between several worthy causes.
example.egtrans: 那笔钱被平均分配给几个有价值的项目。

example.eg: We drank two bottles of wine between the four of us.
example.egtrans: 我们4个人分享了两瓶酒。

example.eg: Trade between the two countries (= their trade with each other) has increased sharply in the past year.
example.egtrans: 在过去的一年里，两国之间的贸易额急剧增加。

example.eg: There is a great deal of similarity between Caroline and her mother (= they are very similar).
example.egtrans: 卡罗琳和她的母亲之间有许多相似之处。

dsense.name: between
dsense.posTip: Word used before noun, pronoun or -ing form of verb to show place, direction, etc.

trans_examp.trans_en: A discussion, argument, or game between two or more people or groups of people involves both people or groups.
trans_examp.trans_cn: （讨论、争论或比赛）发生在…之间

example.eg: The negotiations between the union and management have broken down.
example.egtrans: 工会和资方的谈判已经破裂。

example.eg: There has always been a fierce rivalry between the two schools.
example.egtrans: 这两所学校之间的竞争一直很激烈。

example.eg: Tonight's game is between the New Orleans Saints and the St. Louis Rams.
example.egtrans: 今晚的比赛在新奥尔良圣徒队和洛杉矶公羊队之间举行。

dsense.name: between
dsense.posTip: Word used before noun, pronoun or -ing form of verb to show place, direction, etc.

trans_examp.trans_en: If you choose between two things, you choose one thing or the other.

example.eg: You'll have to choose between a holiday or a new washing machine.
example.egtrans: 你必须在度假和买洗衣机之间作出选择。

example.eg: She was torn between loyalty to her father and love for her husband (= she could not decide which one to support).
example.egtrans: 对父亲的感情和对丈夫的爱不能两全，这让她左右为难。

dsense.name: between
dsense.posTip: Word used before noun, pronoun or -ing form of verb to show place, direction, etc.

trans_examp.trans_en: connecting two or more places, things, or people

example.eg: There is a regular train service between Glasgow and Edinburgh.
example.egtrans: 在格拉斯哥和爱丁堡之间有定期列车开行。

example.eg: The survey shows a link between asthma and air pollution.
example.egtrans: 调查表明哮喘病与大气污染有关。

example.eg: He commutes daily between Baltimore and Washington, D.C.
example.egtrans: 他每天往返于巴尔的摩和华盛顿特区之间。

dsense.name: between
dsense.posTip: Word used before noun, pronoun or -ing form of verb to show place, direction, etc.

example.eg: The wall between East and West Berlin came down in 1989.
example.egtrans: 将东西柏林隔开的柏林墙于1989年被推倒了。

example.eg: The report states that the gap between the rich and the poor has increased dramatically over the past decade.
example.egtrans: 报告表明在过去10年里贫富差距明显增大了。
